p.span: The development and delivery of a high quality curriculum that is aligned to state and national standards is a very complex task. Assembling a great curriculum is like putting together a complicated puzzle. Here at Mason Consolidated Schools, we are working to put together a quality curriculum that will provide teachers, students and parents a framework for a successful PK-12 journey.
